```
int five = +5; // same as: int five = 5
```

```
// Assuming all variables (a,b,c,d,e) have the initial value 10
a += 4; // a = 14, same as a = a + 4
b -= 4; // b = 6, same as b = b - 4
c *= 4; // c = 40, same as c = c * 4
d /= 4; // d = 2, same as d = d / 4
e %= 4; // e = 2, same as e = e % 4
```
